title: [Feywrot Mire, Trail of Spirits]
description: The humidity clings to the exposed skin of any passersby, leaving fine beads of moisture condensing like a sheen of sweat.  Neither the heat nor the dampness seem to have curtailed the growth of a spreading expanse of flowering nightshade.   A collection of hooded pitcher plants flourishes nearby, encroaching slightly on the established pathway.
